channel.title: Sonic Me Mixtape
channel.description:
Sonic Me (Richard Veenstra and Joris Wolff) are a Dutch electronic music duo, operating from Leiden (the Netherlands) and Berlin (Germany) and are working together since 2005. Sonic Me creates electronic music, remixes and productions for other artists, radio programmes and year mixes.
2008 is a busy remixing year for Sonic Me. In the last months they have made remixes for Hit Me TV, Heartsrevolution, MeloManics, Robert Babicz, Cavedoll, Krause and more.
From 2006 until 2008, Sonic Me hosted two weekly radio programmes, Sonic Me on Saturday on Veronica V-Radio and Sonic Radio on Australian PlasticAge Radio. For Dutch radio station Kink FM, Sonic Me produced the official 2005 Kink FM Yearmix.
In April 2008, Sonic won the FOEM/Electronic Youth remix competition and their remix of Robert Babicz´s track Basic got released on vinyl. The record got some good reviews and was included in podcasts and mixes around the globe.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mixtapes of remix- and production-duo Sonic Me
channel.itunes:author: Sonic Me
channel.itunes:summary:
Sonic Me (Richard Veenstra and Joris Wolff) are a Dutch electronic music duo, operating from Leiden (the Netherlands) and Berlin (Germany) and are working together since 2005. Sonic Me creates electronic music, remixes and productions for other artists, radio programmes and year mixes.
2008 is a busy remixing year for Sonic Me. In the last months they have made remixes for Hit Me TV, Heartsrevolution, MeloManics, Robert Babicz, Cavedoll, Krause and more.
From 2006 until 2008, Sonic Me hosted two weekly radio programmes, Sonic Me on Saturday on Veronica V-Radio and Sonic Radio on Australian PlasticAge Radio. For Dutch radio station Kink FM, Sonic Me produced the official 2005 Kink FM Yearmix.
In April 2008, Sonic won the FOEM/Electronic Youth remix competition and their remix of Robert Babicz´s track Basic got released on vinyl. The record got some good reviews and was included in podcasts and mixes around the globe.

item.title: Sonic Me Mixtape Autumn 2008
item.description: The ultimate mix for a post-summer night, created by Sonic Me. Sonic Me (Richard Veenstra and Joris Wolff) are a Dutch electronic music duo, operating from Leiden (the Netherlands) and Berlin (Germany) and are working together since 2005. Sonic Me creates electronic music, remixes and productions for other artists, radio programmes and year mixes. 2008 is a busy remixing year for Sonic Me. In the firts months of 2008 they have made remixes for Hit Me TV, Heartsrevolution, MeloManics, Robert Babicz, Cavedoll, Krause and more. From 2006 until 2008, Sonic Me hosted two weekly radio programmes, Sonic Me on Saturday on Veronica V-Radio and Sonic Radio on Australian PlasticAge Radio. For Dutch radio station Kink FM, Sonic Me produced the official 2005 Kink FM Yearmix. In April 2008, Sonic won the FOEM/Electronic Youth remix competition and their remix of Robert Babicz´s track Basic got released on vinyl. The record got some good reviews and was included in podcasts and mixes around the globe. This mixtape includes tracks and remixes by Sonic Me, The Presets, Ladyhawke, Midnight Juggernauts, Luke Slater, MGMT, crystal Castles, Miami Horror, Health and many more...
